mapper.select: select distinct tp.id, tp.tb_user_id as userId, tp.*, case when pl.tb_user_id = #{userId} then true else false end as userLiked from travel_product tp left join product_like pl on tp.id = pl.travel_product_id where country_id = #{countryId} order by tp.like desc
select tb_user_id as userId, tp.* from travel_product tp where tp.country_id = #{countryId} order by tp.like desc
